mapper.insert: insert into cart (cartNum, gdsNum, userNum, cartAmount) values(cartNum, #{gdsNum},#{userNum},#{cartAmount})
mapper.select: select c.cartNum, g.gdsName AS gdsName, cartAmount, g.gdsPrice AS gdsPrice, g.gdsImage1 AS gdsImage1, (cartAmount * g.gdsPrice) cartMoney from user u, cart c, goods g where u.userNum = c.userNum and g.gdsNum = c.gdsNum and c.userNum = #{userNum} and cartIsdelete = 'N'
